document.full_text: syrian tanks shelled residential districts in two towns on wednesday and at least 19 people were killed across the country, rights campaigners said, as president bashar al-assad's forces fought to crush a seven-week uprising.
document.title: syrian tanks shell towns with at least 19 killed
lines_and_colors: syrian tanks shelled residential districts in two towns on wednesday and at least 19 people were killed across the country, rights campaigners said, as president bashar al-assad's forces fought to crush a seven-week uprising.
